wishlist.description: Stores a named wishlist and associates it with a specific customer and shop.

wishlistItem.description: Acts as a join table, linking a specific product variant to a wishlist.

shopifyCustomer.description: Extends the standard shopifyCustomer model to include relationships to all wishlists and wishlist items created by that customer.

create.description: Allows a storefront customer to create a new, named wishlist for their account.

delete.description: Allows a storefront customer to delete one of their existing wishlists.

create.description: Adds a specific product variant to one of the customer's wishlists.

email/send/wishlist.description: Sends wishlist update emails to customers.

metadata/wishlist/metafield/update.description: Updates the wishlist metafield for a customer.

wishlist.description: Grants permissions to logged-in storefront customers to fully manage their own wishlists (read, create, update, delete).

web/routes/_app._index.tsx.description: This file is the main admin page for the Shopify app that displays a form for updating the default wishlist notification frequency for the shop.

extensions/wishlists-storefront/blocks/w.description: A Shopify theme extension block that adds an 'Add to Wishlist' button and functionality to product pages.

extensions/wishlists-storefront/assets/w.description: The JavaScript file for the wishlist theme app extension.
The CSS file for the wishlist theme app extension.

extensions/wishlist-account-ui/src/Wishl.description: The main React component for the customer account UI extension. It renders the interface where customers can view and manage all their wishlists and the items within them.

extensions/wishlist-account-ui/src/compo.description: Component for the wishlist cards in the customer account UI extension.
Component for the wishlist items in the customer account UI extension.
Component for the create wishlist modal in the customer account UI extension.
Component for the update wishlist modal in the customer account UI extension.

api/utils/email/Wishlist.tsx.description: The component used to render the email for the wishlist update email.

api/utils/wishlist/index.ts.description: Utility that updates the wishlist metafield for a customer.

api/utils/types.ts.description: TypeScript types for email payloads, product variant data, and wishlist changes used throughout the wishlist email functionality.
